abstractContent.text: The abstracts published here we re prepared fr om the longer summaries submitted by contributors.

The selection was made by the Program Committee f or ICCL 7 6 The st a ff of AJCL must accept responbibility for any distortion that qccurred in reducing the length of each surnmary to fit on a single microfiche.
